basic.description:
A detailed study of plays by Corneille, Racine, Molière. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Le théâtre classique

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite       (FREN230 and FREN241) or FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion     No more than 3.0 units from FREN306 or FREN418
